eLabel.text: Glamour Aura FHD Skin by MCelliotG

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (2, 2), size = (80, 80), png = 2), # index 2 is the interface pixmap MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 2), size = (1200, 50), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_TOP, text = 0), # index 0 is the interfacename MultiContentEntryText(pos = (110, 52), size = (1200, 38), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 0), # index 1 is the description ], "fonts": [gFont("RegularB", 32),gFont("Regular", 24)], "itemHeight": 90}

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 2), size = (1200, 45), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_TOP, text = 0), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (120, 45), size = (1180, 75), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_TOP, text = 1), MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (2, 2), size = (80, 80), png = 2), # index 2 is the interface pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("RegularB", 32),gFont("Regular", 27)], "itemHeight": 120}

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (20, 15), size = (72, 72), png = 4), # index 4 is the status pixmap MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 2), size = (1200, 50), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0, color=0x90e6, color_sel=0xdeff), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 50), size = (1200, 40), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 is the description MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (5, 50), size = (0, 0), png = 5), # index 4 is the div pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("RegularB", 34),gFont("Regular", 26)], "itemHeight": 90 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (5, 2), size = (1200, 50), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP, text = 0, color=0x90e6, color_sel=0xdeff), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (5, 45), size = (1200, 30), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP, text = 2), # index 2 is the description MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (1150, 5), size = (72, 72), png = 4), # index 4 is the status pixmap MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (5, 50), size = (0, 0), png = 5), # index 5 is the div pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("RegularB",29),gFont("Regular",23)], "itemHeight": 80 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (150, 0), size = (35, 80), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1, color = 0xffffff, color_sel = 0xf47d19), #index 1 is the selected program icon MultiContentEntryText(pos = (190, 0), size = (250, 80), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER | RT_VALIGN_CENTER | RT_WRAP, text = 2, color=0xc8eaff, color_sel=0xffffc6), #index 2 is the channel name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (450, 2), size = (850, 50), font = 2, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP, text = 3, color = 0xffffc6, color_sel = 0xdeff), #index 3 is the event name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (450, 45), size = (850, 35), font = 3, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP, text = 5, color=0x90e6, color_sel = 0xffffff), #index 5 is the event duration MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos=(10,0), size=(140, 80), flags = BT_SCALE, png=6) #index 6 is the picon ], "fonts": [gFont("RegularB", 35), gFont("Regular", 32), gFont("Caps", 30), gFont("Regular", 28)], "itemHeight": 80 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (5, 0), size = (160, 90), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER | RT_WRAP, text = 0), # index 0 is caid MultiContentEntryText(pos = (170, 0), size = (160, 90), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER | RT_WRAP, text = 1, color = 0xffffff, color_sel = 0xf47d19), # index 1 is csystem MultiContentEntryText(pos = (235, 0), size = (260, 90), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER | RT_WRAP, text = 2), # index 2 is hop 1 MultiContentEntryText(pos = (500, 0), size = (160, 90), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER | RT_WRAP, text = 3), # index 3 is hop 2 MultiContentEntryText(pos = (665, 0), size = (160, 90), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER | RT_WRAP, text = 4), # index 4 is hop 3 MultiContentEntryText(pos = (830, 0), size = (160, 90), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER | RT_WRAP, text = 5), # index 5 is hop 4 MultiContentEntryText(pos = (995, 0), size = (160, 90), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER | RT_WRAP, text = 6), # index 6 is hop 5 MultiContentEntryText(pos = (1155, 0), size = (150, 90), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER | RT_WRAP, text = 7, color = 0xffffc6, color_sel = 0xdeff) # index 7 is sum of cards for caid ], "fonts": [gFont("RegularB", 30),gFont("Regular", 28)], "itemHeight": 90 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (5, 0), size = (90, 90), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 0), # index 0 is caid MultiContentEntryText(pos = (95, 0), size = (220, 90), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1, color = 0xffffff, color_sel = 0xf47d19), # index 1 is csystem MultiContentEntryText(pos = (315, 0), size = (50, 90), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 2), # index 2 is hop 1 MultiContentEntryText(pos = (365, 0), size = (50, 90), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 3), # index 3 is hop 2 MultiContentEntryText(pos = (415, 0), size = (50, 90), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 4), # index 4 is hop 3 MultiContentEntryText(pos = (465, 0), size = (50, 90), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 5), # index 5 is hop 4 MultiContentEntryText(pos = (515, 0), size = (50, 90), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 6), # index 6 is hop 5 MultiContentEntryText(pos = (565, 0), size = (100, 90), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 7), # index 7 is sum of cards for caid MultiContentEntryText(pos = (665, 0), size = (150, 90), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER | RT_VALIGN_CENTER | RT_WRAP, text = 8), # index 8 is reshare MultiContentEntryText(pos = (815, 1), size = (490, 90), font=2, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP | RT_WRAP, text = 9, color = 0xffffc6, color_sel = 0xdeff) # index 9 is providers ], "fonts": [gFont("RegularB", 32),gFont("Regular", 30),gFont("Regular", 21)], "itemHeight": 90 }
